article_title: Ted Cruz: Republicans Love Him in Iowa, Loathe Him in D.C.
article_text:
Sen. Ted Cruz is getting rock-star treatment at his 2016 presidential-campaign events. In Iowa, the state he has visited more than any other, a recent poll found more Republicans viewed him favorably than any other GOP candidate.

Among his fellow senators, by contrast, he is one of the most disliked men in Washington. He has been called “wacko...

twitter.description: Sen. Ted Cruz is getting rock-star treatment at his 2016 presidential campaign events and rising in the polls. In the Senate, however, the Texas Republican has few fans among party leaders.
twitter.creator: @hookjan
